column4: hi all.  using the live CD, what boot options can I select that will do a minimal install?
I'm not sure there's any.  You want the alternate CD, to get a text-only system

You'd have to install the DEsktop system (what you have), which will give you everything you have when you boot the liveCD.  You can later strip stuff off.  Or, go the text-only and build up, or go with something light weight like Xubuntu.
